import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Form, Button, LinkContainer, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from "../components/Loader" import Message from "../components/Message" import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const { loading, error, users } = userList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Users

{ loading ? : error ? {error} : (
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN
)}
) } export default UserListScreen
